title: Scheduled Maintenance
body:
We had to take the servers offline for a bit while we upgrade to Databyss 2.0. Please try again in an hour or two.

✨ The good news is that this upgrade means you probably won't ever see this message in the future. We're moving to an offline-first data architecture, which means you can still work on Databyss while you're offline and your changes will sync back up to the cloud when it's available again, automatically.

Thanks again for your patience while we perform this very important upgrade. 🙏
